title: Apple Daily Exits From Hong Kong Telling Readers ‘Until We Meet Again’
content:
1. Apple Daily Exits From Hong Kong Telling Readers ‘Until We Meet Again’  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Residents say goodbye to pro-democracy Hong Kong paper Apple Daily  CNBC Television
  3. A Eulogy for the Free Press in Hong Kong  The Atlantic
  4. Hong Kong's Apple Daily to shut down after arrests, asset freeze  Al Jazeera English
  5. Hong Kong's pro-democracy newspaper Apple Daily closes with 'painful farewell'  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: Apple Dailyが香港から撤退、読者に「また会う日まで」と伝える
苹果日报退出香港，告诉读者 "直到我们再次见面"。
蘋果日報退出香港，告訴讀者 "直到我們再次見面"。
